resources.string: Double click volume key to launch camera
Swipe left from the right hand edge of lock screen to launch camera.
Screen overlay showing current light sensor status
Easy mode provides a friendly yet intuitive interface experience with a simple layout of core functions.
Double tap the home key to activate the one hand operation mode

In SnapView, you may take pictures, save files, install apps. These files and apps remain safe in SnapView and won't be seen once you exit SnapView.

Before you can create SnapView, you need to set up a screen lock for SnapView.

Note : Your SnapView screen lock must not be the same as Owner's screen lock.

In SnapView, you may take pictures, save files, install apps. These files and apps remain safe in SnapView and won\u0027t be seen once you exit SnapView.\n\nBefore you can create SnapView, you\u0027ll need to set up a screen lock for Owner.
You can create a SnapView to protect your photo, files, and apps.
Please assign a %s account as your Private Mode rescue email account.\n\nThis will help you reset the Private Mode password should it be lost.

Enter screen lock pass and the random PIN to delete SnapView, 

Confirm to delete SnapView from your device. You will lose the photos, apps, and data in Private Mode.

This action cannot be undone. Would you like to proceed?
Congratulations! Your Private Mode password has been reset.\n\nNow you can assign a new Private Mode password, or delete the current Private Mode.
Before creating Private Mode, we suggest you assign a %s account as a rescue email account.\n\nThis will help you reset your Private Mode password should it be lost.

We are about to verify your %1$s account.

Once verification is successful, you can reset your lock screen password.

Note: The next screen belongs to %2$s Account Verification and we do not collect your account information.
Use this to reset your Private Mode password
Erase all data in Private Mode?\nThis action cannot be reversed!
Draw SnapView\'s pattern again to confirm
Draw Owner\'s pattern again to confirm
Cool, your SnapView is created! Now, try to enter SnapView using your SnapView\'s screen lock.
SnapView\'s password must not be the same as Owner\'s
SnapView\'s unlock pattern must not be the same as Owner\'s
SnapView\'s screen lock must not be the same as Owner\'s. Try again.
Owner\'s screen lock must not be the same as SnapView\'s. Try again.
SnapView\'s PIN must not be the same as Owner\'s
SnapView\'s PIN and Owner\'s PIN length must be the same
First, please set up a screen lock for Owner.
Next, please set up a screen lock for SnapView.\n\nNote : SnapView\'s screen lock must not be the same as Owner\'s.
There is saved data in internal storage. Please move this data to external storage before proceeding or it will be erased. Proceed with reset?
Tap app to customize and drag app to rearrange
Skip the slide lock screen page when waking up
